page.title: 11Indoor Leisure and Clubs
page.content: Most families have televisions,the favourite programmes of the children in our school being "Street Hawk" and "Cats' Eyes".The favourite indoor board games are Monopoly,Backgammon, Chess,Scrabble and Draughts.15 children in our school have home computers. The boys' Cub group (8-11 year olds) meets on Tuesdays in the Howser building behind the school.They work for proficiency badges and play games. The Explorers,for girls and boys (7-11 years) meet there every Thursday.There are no Brownie packs in this area. Playgroup is held for 3 to 5 year olds on 3 mornings a week in the Hanbury buildings.The Women's Institute meets on the first Wednesday of the month. In the pubs in our area there are computer games.The Baker's Arms has a darts team,dominoes and draughts.
